title: Peter Reynolds - Light A Big Fire
description:
Publication Date: August 6, 2013

Complete guide to building eBooks for the kindle

Writing and publishing your own book is exciting. Throughout history people have lit big fires to celebrate great achievements. Light a Big Fire is about helping people achieve something very spectacular - writing and publishing their own book. I also like the imagery Amazon have used in naming their eReaders, Kindle and Kindle Fire.

Light a Big Fire is both a reference and a how to manual. I have tried to avoid padding the book and concentrate on information which can be used by you to build your books.

The topics discussed in Light a Big Fire include the following:

Formatting a eBook in Microsoft Word

Converting to HTML

Using Amazon to convert your eBook for the Kindle

An advanced guide to Kindle Format 8

Tutorials for Kindle Format 8

An advanced guide to the EPUB format

Tutorials for EPUB

Using Calibre for creating eBooks

Using Sigil to create eBooks

Publishing your book on Amazon, Barnes and Noble and other stores
